webcrawler.algorithm

Class JournalCrawler

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcrawler.algorithm.Crawler
      • webcrawler.algorithm.JournalCrawler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TOSI

    public abstract class JournalCrawler
extends Crawler
    This class specify the Crawler class. Its goal is to search the journal papers link.
